sqlMap.select: select d.id as uuid,a.bid as bid,a.bname as bname,a.bdate as bdate from t_budg_apply a join t_flow b on a.fid=b.fid join t_flowseq c on b.fid=c.fid join t_user d on c.sid=d.sid where d.id=#uuid# order by bid asc
select bunitid as bunitid,bname as bunitname from t_buget_unit
select count(*) as appnum from t_budg_apply
select BDETLNAME as bdname from t_budget_detail a join t_buget_unit b on a.bunitid=b.bunitid where a.bunitid=#bunitid#
select bdetlid as bdetlid,bdetlname as bdetlname,bfeeshow as bfeeshow from t_budget_detail where bunitid=#bunitid#
sqlMap.update: update t_budget_detail set bfeeamount=#bfeeamount# where bunitid=#bunitid# and bdetlid=#bdetlid#
sqlMap.select: select a.bdetlname as bdetlname,a.bfeeshow as bfeeshow,a.bfeeamount as bfeeamount,c.bname as bname, c.bdate as bdate,c.bperiod as bperiod,c.bsum as bsum,c.bremark as bremark from t_budget_detail a join t_buget_unit b on a.bunitid=b.bunitid join t_budg_apply c on b.bid=c.bid and b.bid=#bid#
select bid as bid,bname as bname,bdate as bdate,bperiod as bperiod,bsum as bsum,bremark as bremark from t_budg_apply where bid=#bid#
select name as uname,adate as adate,aidea as appraddvice,isagreename as isagreename from t_user a join t_apprpro_his b on a.id=b.id join t_agree c on b.aagree=c.aagree where bid=#bid#
select fname as fname,fid as fid from t_flow order by fid asc
select a.name as uname,c.flowsequence from t_user a join t_seq b on a.sid=b.sid join t_flowseq c on b.sid=c.sid join t_flow d on d.fid=c.fid where d.fid=#fid# order by flowsequence asc
select id as uuid from t_user where id=#uuid#
sqlMap.update: update t_budg_apply set fid=#fid# where bid=#appnum#
sqlMap.insert: insert all into t_apprpro_his(id,bid,AAGREE,adate,aidea) values (id,bid,0,'无','无') select id,bid from t_user a join t_flowseq b on a.sid=b.sid join t_budg_apply c on c.fid=b.fid where c.fid=#fid# and bid=#appnum#
